text:
АДМИНИСТРАТОР/ADMINISTRATOR

ГАЗОВ ХЪБ БАЛКАН ЕАД/ BALKAN GAS HUB EAD
subject: Holiday Greetings
attachmentsData:
Dear Partners,
The Balkan Gas Hub EAD Team
sends our warmest wishes for a
wonderful Holiday Season and a
joyous New Year!
Wishing you lots of health, prosperity and warmth!
Let us welcome the New Year with joy, live it out
meaningfully and see it off with success!
Kind regards,
Balkan Gas Hub EAD
BALKAN GAS HUB EAD | www.balkangashub.bg | admin@balkangashub.bg
